column5: Thanks Mike, but all those numbers mean is I have far too much spare time on my hands in the winter months
oh...5001....lol way to go
Congrats Lew! I also like your posts! More fish pictures? LOL
Users like Lew are what make OFC such a great site!
Ditto to what Pigeontroller said!

There is no way on earth that Lew made all of those posts.......all of you  on here are getting fooled far too easily. I'm sure if you check his keyboard you will see Marvin's prints all over it. Way to go Marv for helping Lew get the credit for over 5000 posts.  Regards, Sam

FRIENDS like Lew are what makes OFC what it it. Truth be told, Lew is probably way, way over the 5,000 mark because of posts lost due to the many board upgrades we've had over the years. Yes, Lew has dispensed more than his share of good advice, tips, reports, pics and personal feelings about things. Way to go, Bud.
Way to go Lew. This year I hope to be able to meet you in person.
Woooohoooo, like a walking encyclopedia of information you are Lew  Keep them posts coming bud, I'm hot on your tail  Joey
Congrats Lew.5,000 posts thats incredible.
Way to go Lew.  Hence forth thou shalt be known as " Grand PooPah"
Nice job Lew, I always like your advice and reports.
Way to go Lew!   Congrats on your 5000 posts!
congrats lew...you are the man...  keep all that advice comming,i like reading your posts in the morning...cheers
Congrats Lew.
Congrats Lew. I have always enjoy your post.  Something from to remember from your past...
look forward to some more muskie reports there Lew!
It will be a honour to have a fishing god net my muskies for me this summer  Way to go Lew !!
Lew is in da house....Go Lew, its your birthday!!!
Now if we could only teach him how to catch Pickeral.
